test.name: bromo_grignard
args: -S -Y all -X kg -X kekule -X ersfrm -a 2 -q f -v -R 1 -I #{datadir}/Bromo_Grignard_CentroidRxnSmi_1 -P UST:AZUCORS #{datadir}/grignard.smi

test.name: mannich
args: -S -Y all -X kg -X kekule -X ersfrm -a 2 -q f -v -R 2 -I #{datadir}/Mannich_CentroidRxnSmi_2 -P UST:AZUCORS #{datadir}/mannich.smi

test.name: reductive_amination
args: -S -Y all -X kg -X kekule -X ersfrm -a 2 -q f -v -R 0 -I #{datadir}/Aldehyde_CentroidRxnSmi_0 -P UST:AZUCORS #{datadir}/random1000.smi

test.name: sameParticleAddBondBreakBond
args: -S -Y all -X kg -X kekule -X ersfrm -a 2 -q f -v -R 1 -I #{datadir}/CentroidTad.smi -P UST:AZUCORS #{datadir}/testMol1.smi
comment: Bug generate bogus output when rxn called for a new bond in one component that was NOT the first Component
May 2025. The bug is now detected during the internal consistency check
